question: In my work environment, it is most important to me...
optionA: To help co-workers and to be in a peaceful environment
optionB: To feel that my co-workers admire me and to be free from rigid rules.
optionC: o know exactly what is expected of me and to finish one task before moving to another.
optionD: To get things done and to see results.
answer: To get things done and to see results.

question: When someone offers an opinion or conclusion and I disagree, I am most likely to...
When I am working on a team and we encounter a difficulty of some kind, I am most likely to say...
optionA: Lighten up! Just go with the flow!
optionB: To get things done and to see results.
optionC: o know exactly what is expected of me and to finish one task before moving to another.
answer: Lighten up! Just go with the flow!
